pantha’nycha sayanasanan an ayata ninda apahasa no kirimath, anunta pida no kirimath, prathimoksha sanwara silayen yuthu wimath, bhojanaye pamana dana gena walandimath, dura aatha senasun sewanaya kirimath, samatha widarshana bhawanawe yedimath yana me karunu thamayi budurajanan wahanselage anushasanaya wanne.
